channel.title: crash loading level after c1a1d
channel.description: It's the area where the houndeye causes the walkway to collapse. If I try to crawl through the air vent, the game crashes loading the next level. If I jump down to the other side of the walkway and walk through that way, the game crashes loading the next level. I've attached a .mdmp. I loaded it up in the debugger and this is what it spit out: This dump file has an exception of interest stored in it. The stored exception information can be accessed via .ecxr. (1254.1740): Access violation - code c0000005 (first/second chance not available) eax=00000000 ebx=00000000 ecx=0018dca0 edx=00000000 esi=0000133c edi=0de8edb9 eip=778e0c22 esp=0018ba24 ebp=0018ba34 iopl=0 nv up ei pl zr na pe nc cs=0023 ss=002b ds=002b es=002b fs=0053 gs=002b efl=00000246 ntdll!ZwGetContextThread+0x12: 778e0c22 83c404 add esp,4 0:000> .ecxr *** ERROR: Symbol file could not be found. Defaulted to export symbols for vphysics.dll - eax=02d4eb80 ebx=0018dc94 ecx=0018dca0 edx=00000000 esi=64b836d0 edi=58585858 eip=0ff49e00 esp=0018dc3c ebp=00000000 iopl=0 nv up ei pl nz ac po nc cs=0023 ss=002b ds=002b es=002b fs=0053 gs=002b efl=00010212 vphysics!CreateInterface+0xec20: 0ff49e00 8b3e mov edi,dword ptr [esi] ds:002b:64b836d0=???????? hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_16T0_46_32C0.mdmp (106 KB)

item.title: crash loading level after c1a1d
item.dc:creator: gnoway
item.description:
I changed to a lower resolution, turned off all the advanced graphics options and ran the game in a window vs. full screen. I was then able to get the next level loaded.

Read full topic

item.title: crash loading level after c1a1d
item.dc:creator: gnoway
item.description:
It’s the area where the houndeye causes the walkway to collapse. If I try to crawl through the air vent, the game crashes loading the next level. If I jump down to the other side of the walkway and walk through that way, the game crashes loading the next level.

I’ve attached a .mdmp. I loaded it up in the debugger and this is what it spit out:

This dump file has an exception of interest stored in it.
The stored exception information can be accessed via .ecxr.
(1254.1740): Access violation - code c0000005 (first/second chance not available)
eax=00000000 ebx=00000000 ecx=0018dca0 edx=00000000 esi=0000133c edi=0de8edb9
eip=778e0c22 esp=0018ba24 ebp=0018ba34 iopl=0 nv up ei pl zr na pe nc
cs=0023 ss=002b ds=002b es=002b fs=0053 gs=002b efl=00000246
ntdll!ZwGetContextThread+0x12:
778e0c22 83c404 add esp,4
0:000> .ecxr
*** ERROR: Symbol file could not be found. Defaulted to export symbols for vphysics.dll -
eax=02d4eb80 ebx=0018dc94 ecx=0018dca0 edx=00000000 esi=64b836d0 edi=58585858
eip=0ff49e00 esp=0018dc3c ebp=00000000 iopl=0 nv up ei pl nz ac po nc
cs=0023 ss=002b ds=002b es=002b fs=0053 gs=002b efl=00010212
vphysics!CreateInterface+0xec20:
0ff49e00 8b3e mov edi,dword ptr [esi] ds:002b:64b836d0=???
hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_16T0_46_32C0.mdmp (106 KB)

Read full topic
